properties.description: Explorar un archivo json de una sola linea

content.query:
use electric_vehicle_explorer;

SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, '$.vehicleType') as SMALLINT) vehicle_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, '$.electricVehicleType') as VARCHAR(50)) electric_vehicle_type
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS vehicle_type

/*
Utilizando el CAST asignamos el data type adecuado para economizar en las consultas 
*/

--Verificar el data type 
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, ''$.vehicleType'') as SMALLINT) vehicle_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, ''$.electricVehicleType'') as VARCHAR(50)) electric_vehicle_type
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vehicle_type.json'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''electric_vehicle_data_bronze'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ''0x0b'',
        FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b'',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''0x0a''
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS vehicle_type;'



--Funcion OPENJSON    
SELECT 
   vehicleType,
   electric_vehicle_type
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS vehicle_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        vehicleType SMALLINT,
        electric_vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) '$.electricVehicleType'
    );

--------------------------------------------------
--- Reading data from JSON with arrays -----------
--------------------------------------------------
--USE json_value to explore the array
SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, '$.vehicleType') as SMALLINT) vehicle_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, '$.electricVehicleType[0].value') as VARCHAR(50)) electric_vehicle_type_0,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonDoc, '$.electricVehicleType[1].value') as VARCHAR(50)) electric_vehicle_type_1
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS vehicle_type


--USE openjson to explore the array
SELECT 
    vehicleType,
    electricVehicleType_value
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS vehicle_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
         vehicleType SMALLINT,
        electricVehicleType NVARCHAR(MAX) as Json
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(electricVehicleType)
    WITH(
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        electricVehicleType_value VARCHAR(50) '$.value'
    );
